short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension for Validating if user is logged in on Chegg.com or not.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is chrome extension for our company to track the tutors online time.
The tutor login and maintains their login activity on chegg using this extension.
